statements: SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT video_id, views FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT video_id, likes, dislikes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE views < 5000;
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE dislikes = (SELECT MIN(dislikes) FROM video_engagement_metrics);
SELECT video_id, views, likes, dislikes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE video_id = (SELECT MAX(video_id) FROM video_engagement_metrics);
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT video_id, views, likes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT video_id, likes, dislikes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE video_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 AND likes < dislikes;
SELECT video_id, views, dislikes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE views > 500 AND dislikes = 0 ORDER BY video_id ASC;
SELECT video_id, likes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE likes BETWEEN 50 AND 100 OR dislikes > 10 ORDER BY likes DESC, video_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM VideoMetrics;
SELECT video_id, likes, views FROM VideoMetrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM VideoMetrics;
SELECT * FROM ViewerMetrics WHERE total_watch_time > 1000 ORDER BY total_videos_watched DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, total_watch_time, last_viewed_video_id FROM ViewerMetrics WHERE average_watch_time < 500 ORDER BY last_viewed_video_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM VideoMetrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, views ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT video_id, likes, comments FROM VideoMetrics WHERE views > 1000 AND engagement_score >= 50;
SELECT viewer_id, total_watch_time, average_watch_time FROM ViewerMetrics WHERE total_videos_watched > 50 ORDER BY total_watch_time DESC;
SELECT video_id, likes, comments, views FROM VideoMetrics WHERE engagement_score > 80 AND likes > 100 AND comments > 50;
SELECT viewer_id, total_videos_watched, last_viewed_video_id FROM ViewerMetrics ORDER BY total_videos_watched DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics;
SELECT view_count, engagement_rate FROM video_engagement_metrics ORDER BY view_count DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, region FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT video_id, timestamp, engagement_duration FROM video_performance_logs WHERE engagement_duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT v.video_id, v.view_count, p.engagement_duration FROM video_engagement_metrics v INNER JOIN video_performance_logs p ON v.video_id = p.video_id;
SELECT video_id, view_count, engagement_rate FROM video_engagement_metrics
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, region FROM viewer_demographics
SELECT log_id, video_id, viewer_id, timestamp, engagement_duration FROM video_performance_logs
SELECT view_count, engagement_rate, video_id FROM video_engagement_metrics
SELECT region, gender, age, viewer_id FROM viewer_demographics
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics
SELECT video_id, engagement_time, playback_count FROM video_engagement_metrics ORDER BY playback_count DESC
SELECT AVG(playback_count) AS average_playback_count FROM video_engagement_metrics
SELECT viewer_id, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM engagement_time)) AS total_engagement_seconds FROM video_engagement_metrics GROUP BY viewer_id
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE playback_count > 100 ORDER BY engagement_time DESC
SELECT video_id, engagement_time FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT viewer_id, playback_count, engagement_time FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_time > '00:05:00'
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND playback_count > 50 ORDER BY playback_count DESC
SELECT video_id, viewer_id FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE playback_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY viewer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, description, upload_date FROM video_metadata WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT category_name FROM video_categories WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM video_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_id, engagement_rate, popularity_score FROM video_performance WHERE engagement_rate > 0.75;
SELECT * FROM video_engagement_metrics ORDER BY views DESC, likes ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT video_id, views, dislikes FROM video_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 1000 ORDER BY dislikes DESC
SELECT v.title, vm.category_name FROM video_metadata v INNER JOIN video_categories vm ON v.video_id = vm.category_id WHERE v.duration > 600 ORDER BY v.upload_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT vp.video_id, vp.engagement_rate, vp.popularity_score, vm.title FROM video_performance vp INNER JOIN video_metadata vm ON vp.video_id = vm.video_id WHERE vp.shares > 500 ORDER BY vp.popularity_score DESC

SELECT vu.username, vu.email, vp.average_watch_duration FROM video_users vu INNER JOIN video_performance vp ON vu.user_id = vp.video_id WHERE vp.average_watch_duration < 1500 ORDER BY vu.registration_date ASC
